net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.strategy

Class BasicSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.strategy.AbstractSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
          • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.strategy.BasicSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCrawlingDeltaSearchIndexer, SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyVcs

    public abstract class BasicSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
extends AbstractSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy
    This class extends AbstractSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy with a simple implementation for isResponsible(SearchIndexerSource) using a fixed set of update-strategies.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

        public BasicSearchIndexerUpdateStrategy(String... responsibleStrategies)

    • Method Detail

      • isResponsible

        public boolean isResponsible(SearchIndexerSource source)
        This method determines if this SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy is responsible for indexing the given source.
        Typical implementations will check if the update-strategy matches a specific value.
        Parameters:
        source - is the SearchIndexerSource to index (incremental) according to its update-type.
        Returns:
        true
        See Also:
        SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManager.getStrategy(SearchIndexerSource)
